text: (romesh dhanushka silwa)
eeth oyala dina dunna mama ude hawa dakina kathawak.
mama eeka doktata kiwahama dokta kiwa ehema kannadi dekak danda ba kiyala’ aa ese kiya sinaha wanniya.

tu stets’, rasi, gulboyi, diyar sindagi wani chithrapatawala di aaliya dakwu rangana kusalathawaya wicharakayange pasasumata lakwi thibuna.

ee sambandhayen eki madhyayata sthuthiwantha wemi.ehidi apa sakachcha kale atham drushya madhya wisin samaja sadacharayata karanu labana wyasana ganaya.

enam chathuth dhyana samapaththiyedi kaya sankhara niruddha wenawa.
dan ithin eya thamayi ape jiwithe...
mema ulela kotas thunakin yuktha ya.
ee wagema antharjala sambandhathawa athuwa wuwath anekuth durakathana ha sasandana wita wadi aayukalayak batariya sakriya pawathinawa.
ee wage thamayi.man kiyanne na oya lipiye adangu wela thiyena karunu asathya eewa kiyala.man kiyanna hadanne oya
meya netowa thula itha barapathala arbudayak pawathina awasthawak.
mamath samahara welawata ethana inna ida thiyenawa, ithin awilla poddak wachanayak katha karala yanna.

ee pilibandath sadudatama katha karannam.
regar tageriyan lesin nam labanawa.

mathrubhumiya wenuwen hada nagana mahajana niyojithayange hada siragathakara mathrubhumiya sampurnayenma wanasana bedumwadi wyawasthawak janathawa matha balahathkarayen patawana pasubima hadimata wathman aanduwa katayuthu karana bawata jathika nidahas peramune nayaka, parlimenthu mantha්ri wimal wirawansha mahatha chodana karayi.

esema itha hitha honda miniseki.
“ane mage kale...
adhika lesa wehesata path semiyanth nidagena hunnaya.
eenisa latta lotta ekathu karanna epa.thamanuth itha pirisiduwata inna.
meka nisa uthure boho nagarawala welendapola aarthikaya diyunu wemin pawathinawa.
danata ma samiyo sath denek mata ahimi wi giyo ya.
‘awami lig’ aandu pakshaye hitapu samajikayata ihatha ki thinduwa laba di aththe bangaladeshaye wishesha winishchaya sabhawak wisinuyi.
subha sahithya masayak!!!
moko thiyan hitiya kiyala wadiwenawaya!”
eeth pandiyan inne dwikotikaye.
owun ee wana wita thamange pawulata, biriyata pemwathiyata thadin alum karaminuyi sitiye.
hemin sare nuwara nagareta aawa...
kese wethath me giya rasikayin athara etharamma janapriya wunu githayak nowe.
anuwa, aparadhakaruwan wana dahaka nisa sidu, praja ha mada panthi samagama yana dekama balawath minisun samanga sambandhawa, dekama disthrikkaye, jathika, pawa aasiyan mattama dakwa sama witama we.
oonama sankalpayakata ho kriyawaliyakata me thaththwaya wadi sambhawithawakin sadharanaya.

ada api wasara 24 ta pasuwa yaldewiyen uthuraya gaman karanawa.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha piyawara nogaththa nam kumana amathiwaraya sitayada dwithiyika pasal 1,000k nirmanaya karannata baha.

kalaya wegayen gatha wuna.mama dan tharunayek..mathiwge illima mata nithara nithara sihipath wuna.mata hithunu hamadema kolawala katu ganna mama purudu wuna.anthimedi kola rashiyakin samanwitha gonuwak bawata eya path wuna.dawasak mama ee lipi gonuwa ammata kiyawanna dunna.aya eeka agaya kaleth naha,wiwechanaya kaleth naha.

gabini samaye the bima adhikawa kala, haritha the panaya kala aya samanga kala paryeshanayakin me bawa oppu wela thawath adhyayanayaka di, garbhani samaye palamu thraimasika kalaya thula wadima haritha ha shakasara the panaya kala kanthawanta awama washayen panaya kala ayata wada rudhiraye eeyam mattama 6-14% kin ihala gos thibe.
siyalla thiranaya karanne chandaya ganan karana udawiyayi.”

me hethuwa nisa niwaradiwa dharmaya danaugath ayata mebanda samaja aakalpa niwaradi kirimata apahasu wana tharamata mebandu waradi samaja aakalpa samajaye bahulawa pralachalithawa pawathi.mita hethuwa paryapthiya pilibanda nuthana samajaye pawathina adu danumayi.ada rakiya welanda palata awashyaha thakshuna gnyanaya nisa wadi deneku pelambaenuye ewani de pilibanda dana igena ee thulin wada honda wruththiya awastha padaganimataya.pali bhashawa ho bududahama wani wishayan pilibandawa warthamana samajaye aththe itha adu awadhanayaki.esema samajaya aluth aakalpa kerehi dakwanuye wadi awadhanayaki.me thathwaya upakari karaganimin sanwidhanathmaka piriswalata yam yam mathawada prawacharaya karaharimata ithama honda pasubimak sakasi thibe.ee thathwaya matha aagamika ha aagamika nowana yam yam mathawada samajaya pura wegawathwa pracharaya karaharimata mebandu sanwidhanathmaka piris uthsuka wethi.nidasunak lesa nuthana samajayedi awinhisawa arthakathanaya karanuye ganna aahara panadiyata sapekshukawa bawa pahadili lesa dakaganimata labe.me anuwa mas malu biththara wani sathwada mansha ha eeta sambandha aaharayan ganna aya itha darunu krura hinsakayin lesa salakimata samajaye wadi denek pelambai sitithi.ee adahasata anuwa parama awihinsawa wanuye prasathigha sangnyawa sithin iwath kirima nowe.masmalu biththara aadide ganimen walakimayi.pralathigha sangnyawa sithe thibunada owunta ehi kisidu gataluwak natha.manda prthigha sangnyawa sithe athibawa samajayata bahirawa nopenena bawini.namudu mas malu biththara aadi de ganimen walakima bahirawa samajayata predarshanaya we.ema nisa eya praaadarshanathmaka kri yawaki.ee pranadarshanathmaka krioyawa nisa pranathipaththiya pilibanda samajayata labi aththe waradi chithra yaki.me hethuwa nisa ada prawathipaththi rakina bawa pennima pinisa samajayata pra darshanathmaka kriraya bahirawa dakwime prawawanathawa ihala gos thibe.ada wadi denek awankawa prashathipaththi norakithi.prthipaththi norakina bawa nopenwa sitime kalawak washayen ada wadideneku upayogikaraganne mebandu bahira pridarshanathmaka krimayakarakam wadi washayen sidukirima bawa pahadiliwama daknata labe.
di premarathna, dharmasiri bandaranayaka wani wishishta nirmanakaruwan bihi wune ape tharuna kalayedi kiyalayi.
mita kalin thibba anik sayibar gettu awurudu uthsawa walata giya un windapu de dakala sathutu hithunata me para wisthara dakkama aththata dukayi.

chayarupayak nirikshanaya kara ehi athi aaharaya kumakda saha aaharaya nipadawime wattoruwa pilibadawa anawaki pala kala haki wu pariganakaya magin bhawitha karana algorithamayak (wishesha kramalekhakayak) nirmanaya kirimata paryeshakayo samath wuha.
barapathala aparadha pilibandawa lihil sankalpayan athi kirimen sidu wanne samaja sthawarathwaye ema mulika padanamata pahara dimayi.

thaththwayen bala aahara alewi kirima, apirisidu aahara alewiya, paribhogikaya nomanga yawana aakaraye aahara lebal kirima, paribhojanayata nusudusu lesa aahara gabada kirima yanadi hethun matha nadu pawaru bawa da ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.

nathnam ithin moka ariyath mattu wenne bada thamayi.

eeke mahendrath niyameta kara.

wijithapura sangramaya[sanskaranaya] elara rajuge awasan marmasthanayak wu wijithapura balakotuwa athpath kara ganima sandaha wu satanehidi thiranathmaka karya bharayak itu kirimata suranimala samath wiya.
polis departhamenthuwen lipikaru sewaye sita wishramikawa sitina piyadasa mahatha ahangama gramiya bankuwe mudal thanpath kala ayeki.
samahara janapriya kiyana gayaka gayikawan karanne sangithaya ha thanuwa wenath githayakin ukahagena eekata wachana obbawala gayana karana ekayi.
ekekwath me gem eka nikamatawath uthsaha karanne nathnam thamayi hoda.
ayath dannawa aya thula oya kerehi kisima aadarayak naha kiyala....

amarikawe janadhipathi lesa sewaya karapu ayisanhawar, tharu pahe jenaralwarayek.
ee nanda bawa nalakatath malikatath theruna.
ee shuddha thathwayata pathwechcha uththamayan wahansela langa thiyenne ee uththarithara aadarayayi.
idiriyedi hamuwemu meka haraha.
aluth 'templet ekak'.
ehidi wenas wanne drushtiya hewath dakimayi.

kol dena yahaluwo bana wadithi.

mewa ikman nokara chandayata giyoth ape parajaya eekantha yayi samaja sawibala ganwim saha subasadhana niyojya amathi ranjan ramanayaka mahatha eeye (12 da) pawasiya.
eka, onna ehenam.

yuropa sangam thanapathi thunglayi marigiyu saha kanediyanu shri lanka maha komasaris sheli wayit samanga sakachchawedi matha kalinawa parlimenthu kriyadamaya shakthimath kirima sandaha thabana lada idiri piyawara pilibandawa karu jayasuriya pahadili kaleya.

yapanaya aarakshaka ansha pawasuwe pirisak athurudan wima samibandhayen 2002 wasaredi yapanaya mahadhikaranaye naduwak gonu ෙkata pawathi athara, adala athurudan wima samibandhayen mulika nadu wibhagaya 2002 wasaredi chawakachicheri disa adhikaranaye pawathwa athi bawayi.
siyallatama palamuwen sammuthiya deshiya nithi paddhathiya yatathe balathmaka kala yuthu we.

mewaye uganwanne sudusukam sapiru ayada yanna gataluwaki .adhyapana aayathanayak wisheshayenma upadhi pradhanaya karana ayathanayak yanu samupakarayak men danna adurana kipadenek ekwi arambaiha hakkak ho pawathwagena ya hakkak nowe ...
sampradayika sappukaranayen obbata yamin nawa sankalpayak idiripath kirimata amasan aayathanaya samathwi atha.
asahanakari dewal kiyanawata wada deyak eeken wenne na.
mul sancharayan sahathika kirimen kanthawakata ho gahanu lamayekuta waidyawaraya samanga shakthimath bandimak athi kara gatha hakiya.
eeta passe molayen athe peshi walata yawana paniwidayan udawwen , angili meheyawala pansala alla , hithe thibunu gase rupaya andinawa .
eelaga sathiye senasurada mama sathwa widyawa athireka panthiyata yanna kiyala hithagena nagarayata aawa.
ithin onna oya wage adu padu rasak madde api thun denama thiranaya kala meka bohoma salasum sahagathawa sidu karanna .
ee nisa ethumage awamangala uthsawayata wimal amathithuma saha widesha katayuthu niyojya amathi niyomal perera sahabhagi karawamu.
meya mehe rate kenek neweyida koheda..

mul wiyeda sitama sinhala bauddha sampridayayan anuwa hadunu wadunu ohu, deshapalanayata piwisi ohuge piya wana di.ee. rajapaksha mahatha saha ohuge bappa saha gnyathin da mulika adhyaupanaya labu galu purawaraye richmand widyapalaye mulika igenuma labuweya.
ayage ranganaya thathwikayi.
mema sinhala jathikayata pahara dimen pasuwa muslim jathikayo ohuge yathurupadiya ragena giyaha.
thawa sathiyakin withara mimure jangal risot kiyana pej eke apuru pinthura bala ganna obata puluwan wewi..
akurugoda ha awata pradeshayen amathestha, rabaha, nil manik wani manik wargawalin thanu pabalu soyagatha hakiwiya.
ee aushadhiya palati warga soya ganime aramunin.
katawath ehemawath kiya ganna bari wuna.
mage adahasa niwaradinam ruwanwalisaya nima wimata pera raju miya yame siddhiya aithihasika karunakata wada hondin mithya kathawaka ena jawanikawak hatiyata artha kathanaya kala haka.
mema karadarayan winda dara ganna changumi rajakiya waidyawarunata pawa suwa kirimata nohaki wu rajuge rogayak suwa kara rajuge jiwithaya raka deyi.
agamathi dewd kamaran mahatha parlimenthuwedi mage nama sandahan karamin mehi athi bihisunu thaththwaya gana wisthara kala.
athurudahanwuwange karyalaya pilibanda sankalpa warthawath, nithi ketumpatha sakaskirimata pathkara thibunu kriyakari kandayame ma sama sabhapathi wuwa.
wimukthi deshapalanayata enne na” yanuweni.
me naluwage chithrapata godak thibunath mohuge kadayim chithrapata thunayi thiyenne.

ada inne ama­thi­wa­raya mona­wada aara­kshawa gana danne, wishaya gana nodanna aara­kshaka leka­mwaru hitiya, owunge ee wishaya gana noda­nime wipaka api hondin ath winda, eda kiwwe aami kara­yek aara­kshaka lekam dhura­yata dammoth aara­ksha­wata gata­lu­wak weyi kiyala kiwwa, namuth ada aththa thaththwaya paha­dili wela thiye­nawa.
eeth ada api me jiwath wena (aැththatama, apita jiwath wenna sidda wela thiyena) samajaya thula, aාgamanukula jiwithayak gathakaranna puluwanda...?

mama giya dawasata kochchiya kadenawa..
eyata hethuwa unda apa waniya yana sithuwilla ya.
meka ape niwasa aasannayema wena wishesha kriyakarakamak...
mema stharaye pitatha dumbauru pahayak ganna athara athulatha kola pahayak gannawa.
pothak nam gannawamayi!!!!
ewani samagam boho nathath salakiya yuthu pramanayak atha.
aanduwe kanthoruwaka mase padiyata wada karana samanya minihek kiyana eka man hondin therum aran inne.

mahinda rajapaksha hitapu janadhipathiwaraya sambandhayen warthamana shri lanka nidahas paksha nayakathwaya anugamanaya karana kriya kalapaya anuwa ohu aniwaryayenma pakshayak pihituwima ho pawathina pakshayakata ho sandhanayakata sambandhawima walakwiya nohaka.
angal thunaka pamana wata pramanayak sahitha meya da thada ya, wiyali ya.
janadhipathithumata liyala dunna prakashaye kiyawenawa asathya sakshi dima sambandhayen mata nadu pawariya yuthu bawa.
me ekakwath naraka na.
widarshana- ee kiwwe kothaninda?
diwayina pura jangama polis sthana 456k |

pasu giyada pawathi uuwa palath sabha jandayedi eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya wisin rupiyal 2500ka mudal,sil redi ha wiwidha drawya beduwada uwe niyama jayagrahanaya labuwe eksath jathika pakshaya yayi ada pawathi madhya sakajjawakadi ejapa parlimenthu manthri akila wiraj kariyawasam mahatha pasandahan kara atha...
1212 gahuwama kiyanne fri kols nam ada dawal 12 wenakan witharayi kiyala.
ohuge kadawasam penumath, premaniya katha wilasayath, saragi hangumbara ranganayath holiwudaya wasanga kala karana athara kihipayak.
